import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Container, Row, Col, Card, Button, Alert, Carousel, Image } from 'react-bootstrap'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; const Home = () => { const [error, setError] = useState(null); const [selectedPhoto, setSelectedPhoto] = useState(0); const [isImageLoading, setIsImageLoading] = useState(true); // School photos for the hero carousel - 30+ high-quality images starting from newest const heroPhotos = [ { id: 1, url: '/IMG_8192.JPG', title: 'School Celebration' }, { id: 2, url: '/IMG_8193.JPG', title: 'Student Activities' }, { id: 3, url: '/IMG_8191.JPG', title: 'Learning Moments' }, { id: 4, url: '/IMG_8190.JPG', title: 'School Events' }, { id: 5, url: '/IMG_8188.JPG', title: 'School Life' }, { id: 6, url: '/IMG_8189.JPG', title: '/IMG_8208.JPG', title: 'Educational Activities' }, { id: 26, url: '/IMG_8207.JPG', title: 'School Life' }, { id: 27, url: '/IMG_8206.JPG', title: 'Student Moments' }, { id: 28, url: '/IMG_8205.JPG', title: 'Learning Experience' }, { id: 29, url: '/IMG_8204.JPG', title: 'School Events' }, { id: 30, url: '/IMG_8203.JPG', title: 'Student Activities' }, { id: 31, url: '/IMG_8202.JPG', title: id: 38, url: '/IMG_8195.JPG', title: 'Educational Environment' }, { id: 39, url: '/IMG_8194.JPG', title: 'Learning Moments' }, { id: 40, url: '/IMG_2436.JPG', title: 'School Celebration' }, { id: 41, url: '/IMG_2331.JPG', title: 'Student Activities' }, { id: 42, url: '/IMG_2034.JPG', title: 'Learning Environment' }, { id: 43, url: '/IMG_2033.JPG', title: 'School Life' }, { id: 44, url: '/IMG_2032.JPG', title: 'Educational Experience' }, { id: 45, url: '/IMG_2031.JPG', title: 'Student Engagement' }, { id: 46, url: '/IMG_2030.JPG', title: 'Academic Success' }, { id: 47, url: '/IMG_2029.JPG', title: 'Learning Community' }, { id: 48, url: '/IMG_2023.JPG', title: 'School Spirit' }, { id: 49, url: '/IMG_1973.JPG', title: 'Student Development' }, { id: 50, url: '/aboutus.JPG', title: 'Srijan School' } ]; // Auto-rotate hero carousel React.useEffect(() => { const interval = setInterval(() => { setSelectedPhoto((prev) => (prev + 1) % heroPhotos.length); }, 5000); // Change photo every 5 seconds return () => clearInterval(interval); }, [heroPhotos.length]); // Handle image loading const handleImageLoad = () => { setIsImageLoading(false); }; const handleImageError = () => { setIsImageLoading(false); setError('Failed to load image'); }; return (
{/* Hero Photo Carousel */}
{error && ( setError(null)}> {error} )} {/* Photo Display Box */}
{/* Photo Slider */}
{heroPhotos.map((photo, index) => (
setSelectedPhoto(index)} title={photo.title} /> ))}

About Srijan School

Life at Srijan centres on a shared commitment to academic excellence, intellectual growth, and holistic development. We are dedicated to nurturing young minds in Haldwani, Uttarakhand since 2018.

{/* Message from Leaders */}

Message from Leaders

Words of wisdom from our leadership team
GS
G.S.MEHRA

Manager/Director

"At Srijan School, we believe in nurturing not just academic excellence, but also character, creativity, and compassion. Our commitment is to provide a holistic education that prepares students for the challenges of tomorrow while staying rooted in timeless values."

KK
Kailash Koranga

Principal

"Education is the foundation of a progressive society. At Srijan School, we strive to create an environment where every child can discover their potential, develop critical thinking skills, and become responsible citizens who contribute positively to our community."

{/* About Preview */}

About Srijan School

Srijan School is an educational institution designed to provide learning spaces and learning environments for the teaching of students under the direction of dedicated teachers.

Life at Srijan centres on a shared commitment to academic excellence, intellectual growth, art, athletics, high standards of ethical awareness, sportsmanship, and community service.

{/* Features */}

Why Choose Srijan School

We provide the best education and facilities for your child's growth
💻
Smart Classes

Modern smart classrooms with digital learning tools and interactive whiteboards.

🚌
Transport Facility

Safe and reliable transport service with GPS tracking and trained drivers.

🔬
Science Labs

Well-equipped science laboratories for hands-on learning and experimentation.

{/* Quick Links */}

Quick Links

📋
Rules & Regulations

School policies and guidelines
📸
Gallery

Photos and videos of school events
🏆
Achievements

Student and school accomplishments
📞
Contact Us

Get in touch with us
); }; export default Home;
